contactIds.title: contactIds
contactIds.description: Contact or Lead Name that we want to Book appointment with.

dateTimeToCheck.title: dateTimeToCheck
dateTimeToCheck.description:
Date for which we want to check the slots. The variable needs to be an Apex Date type with format    year + '-' + month + '-' + day + ' ' + hour + ':' 
    + minute +  ':' + second
